title: 05/31/2021 - HOUR 1 - LeBron & Lakers Need a Healthy AD to Compete
itunes:title: 05/31/2021 - HOUR 1 - LeBron & Lakers Need a Healthy AD to Compete
description:
The Lakers' roster is basically the 2018 Cleveland Cavaliers and Anthony Davis' health determines how far the team can go.

Colin discusses the Seahawks emerging as a potential suitor for Julio Jones.


Guest: Chris Broussard

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
